name: Matador Break Out - Game Makers Toolkit Game Jam 2018
name_original: Matador Break Out - Game Makers Toolkit Game Jam 2018
description:
Made for Game Maker's Toolkit 2018 GameJam (Genre without mechanic). 
48 hour game jam.
I chose to do a Breakout/Brick Break game where the paddle is a bull and the player controls the ball, which is the matador. No sound in game.

Left/Right arrow keys to move.
Spacebar to evade the bull.

You lose life with each bull hit, but gain life from pickups from the destroyed bricks.
You can slightly influence the matador's direction while they are in the air.
